text_block_list.name: Saint Lite
text_block_list.text:
Great enthusiasm accompanied its 
every twist and turn. A certain fervor 
found throughout.

text_block_list.name: Saint Lite
text_block_list.text:
It was present in every race. I felt it 
on the day I tasted pride and glory.

text_block_list.name: Speed Symboli
text_block_list.text:
When I took on the world, I was forced 
to concede just how big it was.

text_block_list.name: Speed Symboli
text_block_list.text:
In response, I set my sights on the future. 
Until that day when I stood tall once more.

text_block_list.name: Haiseiko
text_block_list.text:
What was once a niche hobby was 
elevated to a form of entertainment 
known across the nation.

text_block_list.name: Haiseiko
text_block_list.text:
That day, the whole of Japan became 
captivated by our racing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Yet today, this love is a relic of the past.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
This mania has entered a slumber… 
The sound that now dominates the turf 
is that of the wind rushing by.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Does that mean our races have crossed 
the finish line? That days like those will 
never be experienced again?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Legends can be found right here.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
We shall hear unprecedented levels 
of cheers thunder over the turf. 
A turf that hosts our dance.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
We'll bring life back to the Twinkle Series! 
Together!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: —— This is the beginning of our generational legend.
